name: Bane
description:
Bane fills your enemies with fear and doubt.  Each affected creature takes a -1 penalty on attack rolls and a -1 penalty on saving throws against fear effects.  
Bane counters and dispels bless.

name: Bless
description: Bless fills your allies with courage. Each ally gains a +1 morale bonus on attack rolls and on saving throws against fear effects. Bless counters and dispels bane.
area: The caster and all allies within a 50-ft. burst, centered on the caster
